attributes.action: Democratic right to vote on important issues by the electorate by email
attributes.additional_details:
In light of the recent spending of an estimated ten million pounds by the government for the funeral of the late Lady Thatcher.  We request the right for all the electorate to given the opportunity to vote electronically to say yes or no if they want the taxpayer to foot the bill.
This includes all important issues which will affect us.
This includes a vote to allow free prescriptions for England and not just Scotland, Northern Ireland and Wales. A vote to declare St George's Day a public holiday etc etc...
